subject: Re: [junit] Adding Junit to Eclispe
msgSnippet: Greg, Just to be clear, you re hoping to see New  JUnit Test Case on the right-click list, right? Are you sure your Eclipse version is 1.3.1.20100916-1201?
messageBody:
Greg,

Just to be clear, you're hoping to see New > JUnit Test Case on the
right-click list, right?

Are you sure your Eclipse version is 1.3.1.20100916-1201? Eclipse 3
was many years ago. Just a first check. Good luck,

David Saff

On Fri, Feb 11, 2011 at 4:34 PM, Greg Cooper <gregory_cooper@...> wrote:
> Not sure if this is the right forum, but I am trying to get Junit to show in the drop down menu on eclipse. I have right click on the project and clicked on New and was expecting to see Junit as an option here which it wasn't. Â It also is not showing as an option under the Other selection either. This for:
>
> Eclipse version 1.3.1.20100916-1201
> Junit4.9b2
> Junit4.5
> Junit3.8.2
>
> Any help would be appreciated.
> Thanks, Greg
